name: MyToothbrushTimer
0:
”Alexa, start My Toothbrush Timer”
”Alexa, open My Toothbrush Timer”
”Alexa, launch My Toothbrush Timer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my toothbrush timer
des:
My Toothbrush Timer is a simple, no-frills skill to help you make sure you brush your teeth for a full two minutes -- without the extra chatter.

You can say:

"Alexa, start My Toothbrush Timer"
"Alexa, open My Toothbrush Timer"
"Alexa, launch My Toothbrush Timer"

My Toothbrush Timer starts with the top left, top right, bottom left, then bottom right. Since you probably can't hear Alexa very well while you're brushing your teeth, the only time she'll say anything is when it's time to switch.

Tip: It's probably best to get the toothpaste on your toothbrush before you start My Toothbrush Timer.

Please send us an email with your suggestions at MRadio.Dev+mtt@gmail.com. Your reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, thanks!

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
